channel.title: Demergence
channel.itunes:author: Jordan Last @lastmjs
channel.description: Deep discussions about the Internet Computer, DFINITY, Ethereum, blockchain, and more

item.title: Demergence Episode 4 - Existential Threats to the Internet Computer
item.description: I think these could be existential threats to the Internet Computer's success. Agree? 1. The NNS is unable to decentralize sufficiently 2. Subnets are unable to decentralize sufficiently 3. ICP is declared a security by the SEC 4. Ethereum adopts chain key -> fantastic sharding

item.title: Demergence Episode 3 - Building a database on the Internet Computer
item.description: I discuss my experience with Sudograph and building a database on the Internet Computer.

item.title: Demergence Episode 2 - The Futures of Ethereum and the Internet Computer
item.description: Demergence Episode 2! I ramble through the idea of blockchains as protocols, protocol domains, and the decentralization, security, and scalability of Ethereum and the Internet Computer and what that means for their possible futures.

item.title: Demergence Episode 1 - Privacy on the Internet Computer
item.description: The second episode of Demergence! We discuss privacy on the Internet Computer, diving into the differences between security of data and privacy of data, and what privacy looks like on centralized cloud providers, Ethereum and other blockchains, and the Internet Computer.

item.title: Demergence Episode 0 - Decentralized Podcasting and Internet Computer Network Overview
